title: The Secret Life of Howard Hughes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/22/22
itunes:title: The Secret Life of Howard Hughes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/22/22
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and author Mark Musick explore his research into the theory that the reclusive aviation billionaire Howard Hughes secretly married a woman and lived without his fortune for more than thirty years under a fake identity.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
